price: 37. Markay samadu dillaacdo oo ay noqoto gaduud sida idiinta7.
arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتۡ وَرۡدَةٗ كَٱلدِّهَانِ
footnotes: 7. Sida harag (maqaar) la magdiyey ee gaduudan, waa Maalinta Qiyaamaha markaas baa la idin abaal marin.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā inshaqqati al-samāu fakānat wardatan kal-dihāni
